name: tilegarden
description: Port of azavea/lambnik to NodeJS | AWS Lambda mapnik renderer

scripts.deploy-new: yarn transpile && claudia create --region us-east-1 --role lambnik-tiler-dev --api-module bin/api --name tilegarden-dev-${USER} --set-env POSTGRES_DB=${TILEGARDEN_DB},POSTGRES_HOST=${TILEGARDEN_DB_HOST},POSTGRES_PASSWORD=${TILEGARDEN_DB_PASSWORD},POSTGRES_USER=${TILEGARDEN_DB_USER}DB_TABLE=${DB_TABLE},GEOMETRY_FIELD=${GEOMETRY_FIELD},EPSG=${EPSG}
scripts.local: yarn transpile && node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 node_modules/claudia-local-api/bin/claudia-local-api --api-module bin/api | bunyan -o short
